original_text: And they shall hearken to thy voice: and thou shalt come, thou and the elders of Israel, unto the king of Egypt, and ye shall say unto him, The Lord God of the Hebrews hath met with us: and now let us go, we beseech thee, three days' journey into the wilderness, that we may sacrifice to the Lord our God.
korean_text: 그들이 네 말을 들으리니 너는 그들의 장로들과 함께 애굽 왕에게 이르기를 히브리 사람의 하나님 여호와께서 우리에게 임하셨은즉 우리가 우리 하나님 여호와께 제사를 드리려 하오니 사흘길쯤 광야로 가도록 허락하소서 하라

sentences.original_text: And they shall hearken to thy voice
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 네 목소리에 귀를 기울일 것이다

sentences.original_text: thou and the elders of Israel
and ye shall say unto him
The Lord God of the Hebrews
three days' journey into the wilderness
that we may sacrifice to the Lord our God
